description:
Suitable for training or as a base for your racing waxes, this iron-on wax quickly penetrates your base for long-lasting glide in various snow conditions.

  • Fluor-free liquid paraffin wax works best below the freezing point
  • Recommended air temperature: -8 to -2C
name: Swix HS7 Glide Wax (-8C to -2C) 60G
